original_text:
If you are righteous, what do you give to him?
    Or what does he receive from your hand?
korean_text: 그대가 의로운들 하나님께 무엇을 드리겠으며 그가 그대의 손에서 무엇을 받으시겠느냐

sentences.original_text: what do you give to him?
Or what does he receive from your hand?
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 그가 당신의 손으로부터 무엇을 받습니까?
